class Ods_StudentDemo_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='_ODSStudentDemographic', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        
        self.schemas['CompassODSStudentDemographic'] = [
                                        ['SKStudent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CompassPersonId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['FirstName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['GovCode1', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Iscurrent', 'string', 'no-op'],                                                       
                                        ]

                                           

    def ingest(self):
        
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'CompassODSStudentDemographic', self.schemas['CompassODSStudentDemographic'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKStudent')

       

ods_StudentDemo_object = Ods_StudentDemo_object()
